mdRecord.dcterms:description: The external walls are of the local yellow Snettisham stone as a foil to the finer grey Whitby stone of the house, and the walls on to the quadrangle are of brick (while the brick visible on the south elevation was originally hidden behind walled enclosures that have been removed) http://www.houghtonhall.com/htmlfiles/1024index.htm [work]
